title: The LG G7 One Is WAY Too Expensive!
tags: lg g7 one vs lg g7 thinq
description: The LG G7 ONE was supposed to be an affordable mid-tier phone.  But now that prices have started to come out, its time to set the record straight and this smartphone is NOT affordable in most regions. Follow along as we review the LG G7 One.
